name: Ajna Center
description: The Ajna Center processes and conceptualizes information from the Head Center, turning inspiration into concepts and opinions.

when_defined.characteristic: Fixed way of processing and conceptualizing
when_defined.strength: Reliable mental processing and consistent perspective
when_defined.challenge: Can be mentally rigid, attached to opinions
when_defined.guidance: Honor your unique perspective while staying open

when_undefined.characteristic: Flexible mental processing, takes in others' opinions
when_undefined.not_self: Trying to be certain, pretending to know
when_undefined.guidance: Embrace the wisdom of 'I don't know' and stay open

stress_protocol.defined: Trust your mental authority and don't force certainty
stress_protocol.undefined: Release need for mental certainty, allow flexibility
